successes.title: The most affordable, automatic sit-to-stand desk.
successes.description: Think, work, and live better with the most affordable "automatic" sit-to-stand desk.

Pledges.description: Thank for your contribution! Every bit helps us reach our goal, you will receive updates and voting rights on new colors and design options + your name will be engraved on our websites Hall of Fame.
You're amazing! Every single dollar brings us closer to our goal. To say thanks, going to send you this beautiful engraved flash drive. No driver required. Works with PC and Mac.
Receive our branded portable power bank phone charger. Works with all smart phones and has enough juice to recharge an Iphone 5 three times. ***Capacity: 4400mAh; Dimension: 4.5" x 2.6" x 0.8" ***

Priority shipping at any Kickstarter-level pricing for a StandDesk, you'll be one of the very first to receive a desk in CANADA, and the pledge amount can be credited to a future order. We plan on creating a distribution center in CANADA by the first quarter of 2015, but if we receive enough pledges, then we'll push that expansion date forward several months.

Priority shipping at any Kickstarter-level pricing for a StandDesk, you'll be one of the very first to receive a desk in GERMANY, and the pledge amount can be credited to a future order. We plan on creating a distribution center in GERMANY by mid of 2015, but if we receive enough pledges, then we'll push that expansion date forward several months.

Priority shipping at any Kickstarter-level pricing for a StandDesk, you'll be one of the very first to receive a desk in AUSTRALIA, and the pledge amount can be credited to a future order. We plan on creating a distribution center in AUSTRALIA by mid of 2015, but if we receive enough pledges, then we'll push that expansion date forward several months.

Priority shipping at any Kickstarter-level pricing for a StandDesk, you'll be one of the very first to receive a desk in U.K., and the pledge amount can be credited to a future order. We plan on creating a distribution center in U.K. by mid of 2015, but if we receive enough pledges, then we'll push that expansion date forward several months.
